parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: The seed to use for the generation. If not specified, a random value will be used.

parameters.description: The seed to use for the generation. If not specified, a random value will be used.

parameters.name: image

param_schema.title: Image
param_schema.description: Image to generate a 3D object from.

parameters.description: Image to generate a 3D object from.

parameters.name: shading

param_schema.title: Shading
param_schema.description: Whether to use shading in the generated 3D object. ~40% slower but higher quality with shading.

parameters.description: Whether to use shading in the generated 3D object. ~40% slower but higher quality with shading.

parameters.name: num_steps

param_schema.title: Num Steps
param_schema.description: Number of iterations to run the model for.

parameters.description: Number of iterations to run the model for.

parameters.name: guidance_scale

param_schema.title: Guidance Scale
param_schema.description: The scale of the guidance loss. Higher values will result in more accurate meshes but may also result in artifacts.

parameters.description: The scale of the guidance loss. Higher values will result in more accurate meshes but may also result in artifacts.

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.default: ugly, bad anatomy, blurry, pixelated obscure, unnatural colors, poor lighting, dull, and unclear, cropped, lowres, low quality, artifacts, duplicate, morbid, mutilated, poorly drawn face, deformed, dehydrated, bad proportions

param_schema.title: Negative Prompt
param_schema.default: ugly, bad anatomy, blurry, pixelated obscure, unnatural colors, poor lighting, dull, and unclear, cropped, lowres, low quality, artifacts, duplicate, morbid, mutilated, poorly drawn face, deformed, dehydrated, bad proportions
param_schema.description: Prompt for the negative class. If not specified, a random prompt will be used.
